name: Midnight Meatball
description:
MIDNIGHT MEATBALL is a single player 3D physics simulation game where you play as a meatball named Olaf. In debt to the mafia who helped him pay for his wife's medical bills, he must steal furniture from his work to pay them off and save his child who is being held captive. Set within an "OKEA", plays must move furniture from the display rooms to the loading dock, earning money before times up and without being caught. 

What's Included in the Demo

Currently, the demo allows players to test and provide feedback on the characters movement, moving furniture to the loading dock, throwing furniture and using a cart. There are 3 planned levels so far and will slowly be available so be sure to check back for updates.

How to Play

Go through the level moving furniture from the display floor to the loading dock. The player must hit the level quota before time runs out. 

Controls

W A S D to Move

Spacebar to Jump

E OR Left Mouse button  to Grab

E while holding an item OR Left Mouse Button to Drop

F while holding an item to Throw

F while using the cart to Use Cart Storage

X while using the cart to Cart Drop Item

P to Pause Game

Feedback

As this game is an ongoing project, we would love any feedback! Please fill out this from in the link provided! Thank you for playing MIDNIGHT MEATBALL.

https://forms.gle/jERtK1jypgispeFKA
